paragraphs.content: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulcher, and two angels standing by it in shining garments.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulcher, and two angels standing by it in shining garments.

paragraphs.content: And they entered into the sepulcher, and not finding the body of the Lord Jesus, they were much perplexed thereabout;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And they entered into the sepulcher, and not finding the body of the Lord Jesus, they were much perplexed thereabout;

paragraphs.content: And were affrighted, and bowed down their faces to the earth. But behold the angels said unto them, Why seek ye the living among the dead?
paragraphs.contentHtml: And were affrighted, and bowed down their faces to the earth. But behold the angels said unto them, Why seek ye the living among the dead?
